title: 72. AITC: Inequities and Political Urgencies with Mark Wigley
itunes:title: 72. AITC: Inequities and Political Urgencies with Mark Wigley
description: This week we continue our ongoing miniseries Architecture in the Time of Coronavirus with guest Mark Wigley, Professor and Dean Emeritus at Columbia GSAPP. In this episode, we dissect how the Corona virus reinforces social inequities, how it changes the ways in which we communicate, what it means to live in a city during a pandemic, and what the role of the architect is in these uncertain conditions.
